maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/3.orig: The rough gem in the west. Home to collectors and the Shad.
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/3.text: La Gemme Rugueuse de l'ouest. Maison des collecteurs et des Shads.

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.orig: Here we are, that should be the village!
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.text: Nous y voilà, ça doit être le village !

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.orig: So...\. how about we go ahead and visit the major building now?
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.text: Donc...\. qu'est-ce que t'en dis si on va directement au bâtiment principal ?

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.orig: You know, to continue the plot and all.
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.text: Tu sais, pour continuer l'histoire et tout.

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.orig: [nods]
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.orig: Continue the plot within \c[3]Ba'kii Kum\c[0] together with Emilie.
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.text: Continuez l'histoire à \c[3]\v[area.heat-village.name]\c[0] avec Emilie.

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.orig: Guard
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.text: Garde

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.orig: Hello human.
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.text: Bonjour, humain.

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.orig: Hi!
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.text: Salut !

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.orig: I mend big light panel you humans gave to Shad.
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.text: Moi réparer grand panneau lumière humain avoir donné Shad.

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.orig: Much work but still grateful for gift.
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.text: Beaucoup travail mais toujours reconnaissant pour cadeau.

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.orig: Hello human.
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.text: Bonjour, humain.

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.orig: Hi!
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.text: Salut !

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.orig: I mend big light panel you humans gave to Shad.
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.text: Moi réparer grand panneau lumière humain avoir donné Shad.

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.orig: Much work but still grateful for gift.
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.text: Beaucoup travail mais toujours reconnaissant pour cadeau.

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.orig: So... what next?
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.text: Donc... c'est quoi la suite ?

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.orig: Well, I guess we head into the dungeon?
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.text: Bien, je devine qu'il faut aller dans le donjon ?

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.orig: We could also do some quests. You decide.
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.text: On peut aussi faire quelques quêtes. C'est toi qui décides.

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.orig: Quests sound good to me.
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.text: Les quêtes, ça me va.

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.orig: We made it.
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.text: On a réussi.

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.orig: Yeah, that was one hell of an area.
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.text: Oui, cette région est infernale.

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.orig: Tell me about it.
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.text: M'en parle pas.

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.orig: But look at this right here.
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.text: Mais regarde un peu ça là.

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.orig: I was told this was like an urban village for these Shad or whatever.
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.text: On m'a dit que ici c'était comme un village urbain pour ces Shads, ou je sais pas quoi.

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.orig: Looks like they're pretty advanced after all. I mean this is a solar farm, right?
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.text: En tout cas on dirait qu'ils sont assez développés en tout cas. Je veux dire, c'est une ferme solaire, non ?

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.orig: I think this was built by humans.
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.text: Je crois qu'elle a été construite par les humains.

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.orig: At least a friend told me there's some kind of relationship going on between humans and Shad.
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.text: Un ami m'a dit qu'il y a une sorte d'amitié entre les humains et les Shads.

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.orig: Oh, that makes more sense... I guess.
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.text: Oh, ça serait plus logique...

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.orig: Good day to you human.
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.text: Bonne journée à vous, humain.

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.orig: Hi!
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.text: Salut !

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.orig: This is human guard.
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.text: Ceci est garde humaine.

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.orig: Helps to protect Shad and humans from hard desert.
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.text: Aide à protéger les Shads et les humains de désert aride difficile.

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.orig: Ooh, look at this, Lea. It's a solar farm!
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.text: Ohh, regarde ça, Lea ! Une ferme solaire !

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.orig: I read about this. It's built by the humans to help the Shad.
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/5.text: J'ai lu quelque chose là-dessus. Elle a été construite par les humains pour aider les Shads.

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.orig: Dourk
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.text: Dourk

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.orig: Dourk
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.text: Dourk

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.orig: Anything wrong?\. I'm just sitting here.
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.text: Qu'est-ce qu'il y a ?\. Je suis juste assis ici.

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.orig: Dourk
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.text: Dourk

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.orig: Anything wrong?\. I'm just sitting here.
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.text: Qu'est-ce qu'il y a ?\. Je suis juste assis ici.

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.orig: Hi!
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.text: Salut !

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.orig: C-crimes in the bazaar?\. What are you talking about?\. I don't know anything!
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.text: Des crimes dans le bazar ?\. De quoi vous parlez ?\. Je sais rien de tout ça !

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.orig: So it was you on the communicator?\. Damn that Billston...
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.text: Donc c'était toi sur le communicateur ?\. Ce satané Billston...

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.orig: I thought someone as ruthless as him would at least be more careful.
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.text: J'aurais pensé qu'un type impitoyable comme lui ferait un peu plus attention à ses affaires.

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.orig: He roped me into this, I swear!\. Told me about all the money, threatened me if I refused, all that!
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.text: Il m'a entrainé là-dedans, je vous le jure !\. Il m'a parlé de tout l'argent qu'il y a à se faire et m'a menacé si jamais je refusais et tout !

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.orig: "No one will care about it,"\. he said. "Those scaly idiots don't know how to handle the money anyway!"\. So much for that.
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.text: "Personne ne s'y intéressera."\. Qu'il disait. "Ces idiots d'écailles ne savent pas gérer leur argent de toute façon !"\. Tout ça pour ça.

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.orig: Well, time to come clean then, I suppose.\. At least I can bring down that jerk with me.
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.text: Bon, il est temps de faire mes bagages et de me racheter, j'imagine.\. Au moins je peux faire tomber ce salopard avec moi !

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.orig: [nods]
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.orig: Dourk
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.text: Dourk

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.orig: Billston
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.text: Billston

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.orig: Well, well, well.\. Where might you lot be going?
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.text: Bien, bien, bien.\. Où est-ce que vous comptez aller comme ça ?

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.orig: Hi!
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.text: Salut !

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.orig: I knew something was wrong once I noticed my communicator missing.\. You \v[lore.title.seeker]s are a sneaky lot, hm?
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.text: Je savais qu'il se tramait quelque chose dès l'instant où j'ai perdu mon communicateur.\. Vous les \v[lore.title.seeker]s vous êtes plutôt du genre discret, hein ?

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.orig: Forget it, man!\. You messed up!\. This is over!
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.text: Oublie ça, mec !\. T'as merdé !\. C'est terminé !

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.orig: It is,\.\. r-\.right...?
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.text: C'est terminé,\.\. h-hein... ?

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.orig: Oh, for you it is.\. Me, though?\.\. I prepared something special just for moments like this!
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.text: Oh, ça l'est pour toi, oui.\. Mais pour moi ?\.\. J'ai déjà préparé quelque chose de spécial pour parer à une telle éventualité !

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.orig: Dourk
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.text: Dourk

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.orig: Billston
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.text: Billston

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.orig: This will be the end of you and no one will ever know the truth!
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.text: Ce sera la fin pour vous et jamais personne ne connaitra la vérité !

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.orig: D-dude, look where we are...\.\. this is madness!
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.text: M-mec, regarde où on est...\.\. C'est de la folie !

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.orig: Silence!\. These expensive preparations won't go to waste.\.\. And I'm out of here!
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.text: Silence !\. Ces préparations couteuses n'auront pas été en vain.\.\. Moi je me tire d'ici !

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.orig: Bye!
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.text: Bye !

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.orig: Dourk
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.text: Dourk

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.orig: W-well... you know how to handle this, right?
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.text: B-Bon... Tu sais déjà quoi faire, hein ?

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.orig: [nods]
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.orig: Good... so... I'll just be hiding around that corner.\. Good luck!
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.text: Bien... Donc euh... moi je vais me cacher derrière ce coin.\. Bonne chance !

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.orig: Billston
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.text: Billston

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.orig: Dourk
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.text: Dourk

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.orig: Well, that certainly was something!\. But leave it to a \v[lore.title.seeker] to save the day, eh?\. Hahahaha...
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.text: Bon, c'était vraiment pas banal !\. Mais bon, vaut mieux laisser un \v[lore.title.seeker] venir te sauver quand qu'il y a un problème, hein ?\. Hahahaha...

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.orig: Anyway, time to go on our ways, right?\.\. Bye!
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.text: Mais bon, il est temps que l'on se sépare, n'est-ce pas ?\.\. Bye !

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.orig: What...?\. After all we've been through?\. I was a victim as much as everyone here!
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.text: Quoi... ?\. Après tout ce qu'on a vécu ?\. Moi je suis une victime, comme tout le monde ici !

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.orig: ... Alright, alright... I will turn myself in.\. At least it's just across the street.
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.text: ... OK, OK... Je vais me dénoncer.\. Au moins j'ai juste besoin de traverser la rue.

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.orig: [nods]
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.orig: Dourk
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.text: Dourk

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.orig: I'll see myself inside.\. So... bye \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Sorry for the trouble and...\. thanks for not letting me die, I guess.
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.text: Je vais me rendre.\. Donc... portes toi bien, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Désolé pour les ennuis et euh...\. merci pour ne pas m'avoir laissé mourir, je crois.

maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.orig: Bye!
maps/heat-village/baki-1.json/entities/6.text: Bye !
